attributes.action: Set in place a National Enquiry into grooming gangs in the UK
attributes.additional_details: This is for natural justice for survivors past and present . The government must recognise the scale of this in the UK and take action on those who allowed this to perpetuate regardless of their political allegiance.
attributes.background: The only way to combat the grooming gags is to have a National enforceable enquiry. The Government must seek justice for the victims and seek to prosecute those who are complicit in allowing grooming gangs to continue the odious criminal atrocities.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Launch a Public Inquiry into Grooming Gangs
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
